TopicTitle: The Forum's back, but the Upgrade's in the VAB

Articles.Content:
<p><a href="http://bit.ly/RGzwDh"><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/38c909f21d885c6f350c1b2e40c6192e/tumblr_inline_n6clzqdl0M1rr2wit.jpg"/></a></p>

<p>The forum is back and you might find things quite familiar. That’s because the upgrade has gone back to the VAB. To read why, click <a href="http://bit.ly/RGzwDh"><strong>HERE</strong></a>.</p>
